title: How come all these scooters or so called DWI vehicles have the right to ride in the lanes on the roads as cars and trucks do? They have no license tag and no insurance so why do they drive down the middle of the roads as WE as citizens are required to pay property tax on our vehicles,have them inspected and have insurance on our vehicles. The drive down the roads like they OWN them.
text:
This recent post to MyReporter.com should answer your question:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7984
